files.patch: @@ -859,3 +859,5 @@ - * @implNote Checks only if it is .lnk shortcut link. Other two links - * namely Symbolic and Junctions returns false, so that the - * absolute path can be resolved. + * @implNote Returns {@code true} for {@code .lnk} shortcuts only. + * For symbolic links and junctions, it returns + * {@code false} even though {@code IShellFolder} returns + * {@code true} now. It is a workaround for easier handling of + * symbolic links and junctions. @@ -867,2 +869,2 @@ - && (!isFileSystem() - || getPath().toLowerCase().endsWith(".lnk")); + && (!isFileSystem() + || getPath().toLowerCase().endsWith(".lnk"));
